snippet: Here is an early look at what to expect this weekend during the first round of the N.F.L. playoffs, though because almost nothing has happened as expected so far this season, it may be of dubious worth.
abstract: Here is an early look at what to expect this weekend during the first round of the N.F.L. playoffs, though because almost nothing has happened as expected so far this season, it may be of dubious worth.
lead_paragraph: The most extraordinary thing about the N.F.L.'s first-round playoff games this year is that the presence of the Detroit Lions is not one of the most extraordinary things.

headline.main: Curiosities Abound in the Playoffs' First Round
